name: Let's Graduate
description:
A game made for my internship program called #mojikencamp in about 1 week.  This game was insipired from the classic gameplay of pacman, and my tears as college student.

Full screen for the betterr!

Controls

  • right/left/up  arrow to move

What to do :

Collect all the papers while dodging your lecturers. Keep your energy full by taking the orange juice!

Thank you for playing! please leave a feedback so i can do better for the next game!
